dialogue.name: GALIENA
dialogue.text: Well met, adventurer. My name's Galiena, and I work at the House of Splendors for my aunt Rowena.

dialogue.name: GALIENA
dialogue.text: Following her successful expansion into Idyllshire and the three cityâ€“states, she's decided to bring her operations here to Rhalgr's Reach.

dialogue.name: GALIENA
dialogue.text: Our presence here serves to aid the recovery effort, creating jobs for refugees and stimulating the economy. With your skills, you would be of great help to us.

dialogue.name: GALIENA
dialogue.text: And of course, if you have any collectables, I'd be happy to take them off your hands in exchange for scrips. With locations realm-wide, it has never been easier to do business with the House of Splendors!

dialogue.name: GALIENA
dialogue.text: Well met, adventurer. If you know any able crafters or gatherers, I'd be thankful for an introduction.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: In order to undertake this quest, you must be a Disciple of the Hand or the Land of level 60 or above.
